alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Knott; Owsley; Perry (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 6:38AM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Owsley, northeastern Perry, northwestern Knott and Breathitt Counties through 715 AM EDT... At 638 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Guerrant, or near Jackson, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Haddix, Copland, Little, Quicksand, Whick, Noctor, Wolf Coal, Altro and Bush Branch around 645 AM EDT. Clayhole, Flintville, Lost Creek, Watts, Smith Branch, Wilstacy, Portsmouth, Press, Haginsville and Stevenson around 650 AM EDT. Hardshell, Ned and Sikes around 655 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Noble, Rowdy, Dice, Lunah, Buck, Ary, Decoy and Daisydell. THIS INCLUDES Kentucky Highway 80 in Perry County between mile markers 10 and 15. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
